IR (KBr) <ce:italic>ν</ce:italic>(cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3363s, 1621s, 1492m, 1468m, 1384s, 1283m, 1162w, 1006m, 831w, 744w, 708w.</ce:para><ce:section-title>Preparation of polymer [Co(NCS)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>OH)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(3-bpfp)]<ce:inf loc="post">

<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (29.1 mg, 0.1 mmol) with continuous stirring. Then a methanol solution (2 ml) of KSCN (19.4 mg, 0.2 mmol) was dropwise added into above mixture while stirring and resulted in a clear red solution. In the next day, pale red crystals (yield: 43%) were deposited from the solution. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">20</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">22</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>S<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>: C, 39.93; H, 4.55; N, 14.71; Found: C, 39.47; H, 4.50; N, 14.78%. IR (KBr) <ce:italic>ν</ce:italic>(cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3290m, 2089s, 1634s, 1600m, 1460w, 1437s, 1274m, 1159w, 1008s, 823w, 735m, 709w.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Preparation of polymer {[Co(H2O)2(CH3OH)2(4-bpfp)](NO3)2} n  (1)

A clear methanol solution (5 ml) of 4-bpfp (59.2 mg, 0.20 mmol) was dropwise added into a methanol solution (3 ml) of Co(NO3)2 ⋅6H2O (29.1 mg, 0.1 mmol) at room temperature. The vial was subjected to shaking about 30 min resulting in a pale red solution. On standing for three weeks, pale red crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained in 46% yield. Anal. Calc. for C20H28N4O12Co: C, 33.34; H, 4.87; N, 12.50%; Found: C, 33.52; H, 4.77; N, 12.83%. IR (KBr) ν(cm-1): 3363s, 1621s, 1492m, 1468m, 1384s, 1283m, 1162w, 1006m, 831w, 744w, 708w.

Preparation of polymer [Co(NCS)2(CH3OH)2(3-bpfp)] n  (2)

At room temperature, a clear methanol solution (4 ml) of 3-bpfp (59.2 mg, 0.2 mmol) was slowly added into a methanol solution (2 ml) of Co(NO3)2 ⋅6H2O (29.1 mg, 0.1 mmol) with continuous stirring. Then a methanol solution (2 ml) of KSCN (19.4 mg, 0.2 mmol) was dropwise added into above mixture while stirring and resulted in a clear red solution. In the next day, pale red crystals (yield: 43%) were deposited from the solution. Anal. Calc. for C20H22CoN6O4S2: C, 39.93; H, 4.55; N, 14.71; Found: C, 39.47; H, 4.50; N, 14.78%. IR (KBr) ν(cm-1): 3290m, 2089s, 1634s, 1600m, 1460w, 1437s, 1274m, 1159w, 1008s, 823w, 735m, 709w.
